title: Valentine's Day Package
seo_title: Valentine's Day Package - Luxury Hotel Offers in NYC - WestHouse Hotel
seo_description: Whether you are traveling to New York for Valentineâ€™s Day or just treating a special someone to a nice staycation, toast the occasion in one of our luxurious WestHouse Hotel New York guest rooms by indulging in a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered treats upon arrival. A complimentary late check out of 2:00 PM is also included.
contents:
Whether you’re traveling to New York for Valentine’s Day or just treating a special someone to a nice staycation, toast the occasion in one of our luxurious WestHouse Hotel New York guest rooms by indulging in a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered treats upon arrival. A complimentary late check out of 2:00 PM is also included.

Must be booked 3-days in advance.
